scripts.build: cd ../superset-frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV="${BABEL_ENV:=production}" webpack --color --mode production --config webpack.jupyter.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean:assets && cd ../superset-frontend && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 NODE_ENV=development webpack --mode=development --color --config webpack.jupyter.js
